sections.content: Cross Country Ski Trail Conditions as of February 9, 2026 –

Bucks Run is groomed for skate and classic skiing. The connector trail between the ski center and Bucks Run is open. For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.
Will be open February 7th & February 8th. Trails are groomed.

sections.header: Ski rentals are required to be purchased in advance online.
sections.content: Click here to rent ski equipment. If you’re having difficulty with our online rental process, click here for a quick reference guide on how to rent ski equipment online.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: 20° and no wind at noon. Clear blue sky and fresh groom on Coyote Run and Hawk Hills. Most of trail had clean, deep packed powder track, short stretches of grass or blown in oak leaves, mostly avoidable in open areas. I used Rode super blue 1st, later Swix purple as bright sun warmed the track. Still by 4 PM, 24°, the snow remained dry and fast. Warm shop with helpful ppl, clean bathrooms, large seating area for resting, eating; I bought a year pass! 12.5miles/20.1km

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Mother Nature’s snow - Nubs groom : it doesn’t any better - LF 7 works .Understand there is a 28 inch hard pack base beneath that groom !  See you in April at Nub’s .

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 chairlifts, Rope Tow and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed and tracked on Sunday. Conditions are extremely good.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: The snow continues to be in great shape on all of our groomed runs with a very solid base. We are now nearly 30 days without a moment of thaw. This sustained cold is creating some remarkable snow conditions. It looks like some more moderate temperatures are in store today and for the entire week with high temperatures forecast to go above 30 degrees.  The lifts will spin today from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is potato leek. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
